alert.note: Alert for Dearborn; Ripley (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 12:31AM EDT until July 01 at 1:15AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ripley County in southeastern Indiana... Southwestern Dearborn County in southeastern Indiana... * Until 115 AM EDT. * At 1231 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles north of Osgood to 11 miles north of North Vernon, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Batesville, Aurora, Versailles, Milan, Osgood, Dillsboro, Moores Hill, Wilmington, Holton, Napoleon, Millhousen, Mount Sinai, Rexville, Cold Springs, Benham, Ballstown, New Marion, Farmers Retreat, Friendship and Versailles Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
